bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌼 I collect pollen.
🍯 I make something sweet.
🐝 I rhyme with 'tree'.

bug.question: I am long and skinny, and I wiggle in the ground. Birds love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🪱 I help plants grow.
🎣 People use me for fishing.
🐦 I am a tasty treat for birds.

bug.question: I am small, red, and have black spots. I am considered lucky! What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am a type of beetle.
🌱 I eat tiny bugs on plants.
❤️ I am often seen as a symbol of good fortune.

bug.question: I hop around in the grass and make a 'ribbit' sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I start as a tadpole.
👅 I catch bugs with my long tongue.
🏞️ I live near water.

bug.question: I can be many colors, and I start as a caterpillar. I fly around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I go through metamorphosis.
🐛 I drink nectar.
✨ I have beautiful wings.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. I have eight legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I can be found in corners of rooms or in gardens.
🕷️ I am not an insect.
🪰 I like to eat flies.

bug.question: I carry things much bigger than myself. I live in a colony. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very strong for my size.
👑 Some of us are queens.
🥪 I sometimes steal food from picnics.

bug.question: I am a bug that makes a chirping sound, especially at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 Some people think my song brings good luck.
🌳 I like to hide in tall grass and bushes.
🦗 I am related to grasshoppers.

bug.question: I am a bug that can light up the night. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I glow in the dark.
✨ Some people call me a lightning bug.
🌙 I use my light to attract a mate.

bug.question: I am a bug that chews on plants and wears a suit of armor. What am I?

hints.text: 🪲 I am a beetle.
🌱 I can damage crops.
🛡️ My shell is very hard.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Sometimes I have pretty colors! What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need water and sunshine to grow.
🌸 I can smell really nice.
🌻 Bees like to visit me.

plant.question: I am tall and have a trunk. Birds like to build their homes in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I have many leaves.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb on me.
☀️ I give you shade on a sunny day.

plant.question: I am long and orange, and you can eat me as a snack. Bugs Bunny loves me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow under the ground.
🐇 I'm a root vegetable.
🥗 I'm crunchy and healthy.

plant.question: I'm a small green plant that grows close to the ground, often forming a soft carpet. What am I?

hints.text: 🧸 You can have a picnic on me.
⚽ People play games on me.
🐄 Cows like to eat me.

plant.question: I am a fruit that gives us something sweet to eat. I can be green, red, or yellow. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White ate a poisoned one.
🥧 You can make a pie with me.
🌳 I grow on a tree.

plant.question: I am a fruit with a hard shell. I'm orange and have seeds inside. People carve me in October. What am I?

hints.text: 🎃 I am used for Halloween decorations.
🥧 You can make a pie with me, too!
🪴 I grow on a vine.

plant.question: I'm a climbing plant that produces sweet, juicy bunches. I can be green, red, or purple. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 Monkeys don't eat me, but people do!
🍷 Some people make juice and wine out of me.
☀️ I grow on a vine in warm places.

plant.question: I am a material that comes from a tall, strong plant that gives us important building material. I can be used to make paper and furniture. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 People build houses with me.
🔥 Sometimes I'm burned for warmth.
🪓 You need an axe to cut me down (if I'm big!)

plant.question: I am a plant that grows in the water, and sometimes people have me in a pond or tank. I have big leaves, and some have pretty flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 Frogs like to sit on my leaves.
🌸 My flowers can be very beautiful and colorful.
💧 I need lots of water to survive.

plant.question: I am a plant with sharp thorns on my stem. I am known for my beautiful and fragrant flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 People give me as a gift to show love.
🩸 Be careful of my thorns; they can prick you!
💐 I come in many colors, like red, pink, and white.
